title: All the Kind Strangers 1974 (Horror, Thriller film) There's Nothing More Dangerous Than a Kind Face.

sources.title: All the Kind Strangers 1974 (Horror, Thriller film) There's Nothing More Dangerous Than a Kind Face.
sources.description:
A man traveling through a backwoods area is held hostage by a group of orphans who want him to become their father. Unfortunately, the kids have a habit of killing adults who refuse that particular honor.

Original title: All the Kind Strangers (1974)
Alternative titles: Evil in the Swamp, 狼童, All die netten Fremden, Tüm Tür Yabancılar, Les Inconnus du désert, Toda clase de extraños
 
Director: Burt Kennedy
Writer: Clyde Ware
Stars: Stacy Keach, Samantha Eggar, John Savage, Robby Benson, Arlene Farber
Genres: Cult, Horror, Thriller, TV movie


00:00 - Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:14 - A man gives a young boy a ride, sparking an unexpected adventure through the countryside.
08:04 - Meeting a rural family, the man is invited to join them for supper, creating a warm atmosphere.
16:32 - Tension rises as a farm family welcomes a stranger, revealing dark secrets and hidden tensions.
21:34 - Mysterious happenings unfold when a stranger encounters a family harboring deep secrets in a remote farmhouse.
28:08 - An isolated family faces a chilling threat after a car goes missing, heightening their fears.
36:41 - Children sabotage a man's car, leading to a critical vote on whether he and his wife should stay as parents.
44:35 - A family finds themselves captive to a manipulative stranger who enforces his own rules.
52:50 - Divided by tension, family members must decide whether to keep or let go of a stranger attempting to escape.
1:03:48 - A family is torn apart by a manipulative intruder, culminating in a tense standoff involving a gun.
